channel.title: Stupid Shop problem [317]
channel.description:
Hello, I'm trying to add a [Single] Item to my PVP items shop. Here is what the shop looked like before [code]shop = 46 Tom's PVP Shop 2 2 10010 100 10013 100 10011 100 10012 1000[/code]
With the above, the shop worked perfectly fine, all items were in there and everything. I tried adding a new item though changing my shop code to this
[code]shop = 46 Tom's PVP Shop 2 2 10010 100 10013 100 10011 100 10012 1000 9003 1000[/code] After I did this, the compiler compiled properly, but when I ran the source, I got this error in the prompt [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/1zoyhdh.png[/img] Why cant I add any more items to the shop?

item.title: Stupid Shop problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @mod_xtomx mod xtomx
item.description:
@mod_xtomx wrote:

Wow!!! WISH I KNEW THIS EARLIER. Dude tysm man! Problem resolved

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Shop problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Tab, not space between numbers.

Read full topic
